column1: '''John Webb''' voiced the part of [[Glorfindel]] in the [[1981]] [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', along with several unspecified parts. He also had an unspecified part in the episode "Farmer Giles of Ham" in the [[1992]] [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
column3: radio series]] of ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm]].
